general.name: mos_target_legacy_survey_dr8
general.description: Legacy Survey DR8 catalogue derived from 'sweep' catalogues (See https://www.legacysurvey.org/dr8/).

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

general.naming_convention: $MOS_TARGET/[V_TARG]/mos_legacy_survey_dr8-[NUM].fits, where V_TARG=1.0.1 for DR18; and NUM = 1..1 to partition the file into parts

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

release.name: RELEASE
release.description: Unique integer denoting the camera and filter set used (RELEASE documentation: https://www.legacysurvey.org/release/)

brickid.name: BRICKID
brickid.description: A unique Brick ID (in the range 1-662174)

brickname.name: BRICKNAME
brickname.description: Name of brick, encoding the brick sky position, eg "1126p222" near RA=112.6, Dec=+22.2

objid.name: OBJID
objid.description: Catalog object number within this brick; a unique identifier hash is RELEASE,BRICKID,OBJID; OBJID spans 0 to N-1 and is contiguously enumerated within each blob

type.name: TYPE
type.description: Morphological model: "PSF"=stellar, "REX"="round exponential galaxy" = round EXP galaxy with a variable radius, "EXP"=exponential, "DEV"=deVauc, "COMP"=composite, "DUP"==Gaia source fit by different model. Note that in some FITS readers, a trailing space may be appended for "PSF ", "EXP " and "DEV " since the column data type is a 4-character string

ra_ivar.name: RA_IVAR
ra_ivar.description: Inverse variance of RA (no cosine term!), excluding astrometric calibration errors

dec_ivar.name: DEC_IVAR
dec_ivar.description: Inverse variance of DEC, excluding astrometric calibration errors

dchisq_psf.name: DCHISQ_PSF
dchisq_psf.description: Difference in chi2 between successively more-complex model fits: PSF. The difference is versus no source.

dchisq_rex.name: DCHISQ_REX
dchisq_rex.description: Difference in chi2 between successively more-complex model fits: REX. The difference is versus no source.

dchisq_dev.name: DCHISQ_DEV
dchisq_dev.description: Difference in chi2 between successively more-complex model fits: DEV. The difference is versus no source.

dchisq_exp.name: DCHISQ_EXP
dchisq_exp.description: Difference in chi2 between successively more-complex model fits: EXP. The difference is versus no source.

dchisq_comp.name: DCHISQ_COMP
dchisq_comp.description: Difference in chi2 between successively more-complex model fits: COMP. The difference is versus no source.

ebv.name: EBV
ebv.description: Galactic extinction E(B-V) reddening from SFD98, used to compute MW_TRANSMISSION

flux_w1.name: FLUX_W1
flux_w1.description: WISE model flux in W1 (AB system)

flux_w2.name: FLUX_W2
flux_w2.description: WISE model flux in W2 (AB system)

flux_w3.name: FLUX_W3
flux_w3.description: WISE model flux in W3 (AB system)

flux_w4.name: FLUX_W4
flux_w4.description: WISE model flux in W4 (AB system)

mw_transmission_g.name: MW_TRANSMISSION_G
mw_transmission_g.description: Galactic transmission in g filter in linear units

mw_transmission_r.name: MW_TRANSMISSION_R
mw_transmission_r.description: Galactic transmission in r filter in linear units

mw_transmission_z.name: MW_TRANSMISSION_Z
mw_transmission_z.description: Galactic transmission in z filter in linear units

mw_transmission_w1.name: MW_TRANSMISSION_W1
mw_transmission_w1.description: Galactic transmission in W1 filter in linear units

mw_transmission_w2.name: MW_TRANSMISSION_W2
mw_transmission_w2.description: Galactic transmission in W2 filter in linear units

mw_transmission_w3.name: MW_TRANSMISSION_W3
mw_transmission_w3.description: Galactic transmission in W3 filter in linear units

mw_transmission_w4.name: MW_TRANSMISSION_W4
mw_transmission_w4.description: Galactic transmission in W4 filter in linear units

nobs_g.name: NOBS_G
nobs_g.description: Number of images that contribute to the central pixel in g: filter for this object (not profile-weighted)

nobs_r.name: NOBS_R
nobs_r.description: Number of images that contribute to the central pixel in r: filter for this object (not profile-weighted)

nobs_z.name: NOBS_Z
nobs_z.description: Number of images that contribute to the central pixel in z: filter for this object (not profile-weighted)

nobs_w1.name: NOBS_W1
nobs_w1.description: Number of images that contribute to the central pixel in W1: filter for this object (not profile-weighted)

nobs_w2.name: NOBS_W2
nobs_w2.description: Number of images that contribute to the central pixel in W2: filter for this object (not profile-weighted)

nobs_w3.name: NOBS_W3
nobs_w3.description: Number of images that contribute to the central pixel in W3: filter for this object (not profile-weighted)

nobs_w4.name: NOBS_W4
nobs_w4.description: Number of images that contribute to the central pixel in W4: filter for this object (not profile-weighted)

rchisq_g.name: RCHISQ_G
rchisq_g.description: Profile-weighted chi2 of model fit normalized by the number of pixels in g

rchisq_r.name: RCHISQ_R
rchisq_r.description: Profile-weighted chi2 of model fit normalized by the number of pixels in r

rchisq_z.name: RCHISQ_Z
rchisq_z.description: Profile-weighted chi2 of model fit normalized by the number of pixels in z

rchisq_w1.name: RCHISQ_W1
rchisq_w1.description: Profile-weighted chi2 of model fit normalized by the number of pixels in W1

rchisq_w2.name: RCHISQ_W2
rchisq_w2.description: Profile-weighted chi2 of model fit normalized by the number of pixels in W2

rchisq_w3.name: RCHISQ_W3
rchisq_w3.description: Profile-weighted chi2 of model fit normalized by the number of pixels in W3

rchisq_w4.name: RCHISQ_W4
rchisq_w4.description: Profile-weighted chi2 of model fit normalized by the number of pixels in W4

fracflux_g.name: FRACFLUX_G
fracflux_g.description: Profile-weighted fraction of the flux from other sources divided by the total flux in g (typically in 0..1)

fracflux_r.name: FRACFLUX_R
fracflux_r.description: Profile-weighted fraction of the flux from other sources divided by the total flux in r (typically in 0..1)

fracflux_z.name: FRACFLUX_Z
fracflux_z.description: Profile-weighted fraction of the flux from other sources divided by the total flux in z (typically in 0..1)

fracflux_w1.name: FRACFLUX_W1
fracflux_w1.description: Profile-weighted fraction of the flux from other sources divided by the total flux in W1 (typically in 0..1)

fracflux_w2.name: FRACFLUX_W2
fracflux_w2.description: Profile-weighted fraction of the flux from other sources divided by the total flux in W2 (typically in 0..1)

fracflux_w3.name: FRACFLUX_W3
fracflux_w3.description: Profile-weighted fraction of the flux from other sources divided by the total flux in W3 (typically in 0..1)

fracflux_w4.name: FRACFLUX_W4
fracflux_w4.description: Profile-weighted fraction of the flux from other sources divided by the total flux in W4 (typically in 0..1)

fracmasked_g.name: FRACMASKED_G
fracmasked_g.description: Profile-weighted fraction of pixels masked from all observations of this object in g, strictly between 0..1

fracmasked_r.name: FRACMASKED_R
fracmasked_r.description: Profile-weighted fraction of pixels masked from all observations of this object in r, strictly between 0..1

fracmasked_z.name: FRACMASKED_Z
fracmasked_z.description: Profile-weighted fraction of pixels masked from all observations of this object in z, strictly between 0..1

fracin_g.name: FRACIN_G
fracin_g.description: Fraction of a source's flux within the blob in g, near unity for real sources

fracin_r.name: FRACIN_R
fracin_r.description: Fraction of a source's flux within the blob in r, near unity for real sources

fracin_z.name: FRACIN_Z
fracin_z.description: Fraction of a source's flux within the blob in z, near unity for real sources

anymask_g.name: ANYMASK_G
anymask_g.description: Bitwise mask set if the central pixel from any image satisfies each condition in g (see the DR8 bitmasks page)

anymask_r.name: ANYMASK_R
anymask_r.description: Bitwise mask set if the central pixel from any image satisfies each condition in r (see the DR8 bitmasks page)

anymask_z.name: ANYMASK_Z
anymask_z.description: Bitwise mask set if the central pixel from any image satisfies each condition in z (see the DR8 bitmasks page)

allmask_g.name: ALLMASK_G
allmask_g.description: Bitwise mask set if the central pixel from all images satisfy each condition in g (see the DR8 bitmasks page)

allmask_r.name: ALLMASK_R
allmask_r.description: Bitwise mask set if the central pixel from all images satisfy each condition in r (see the DR8 bitmasks page)

allmask_z.name: ALLMASK_Z
allmask_z.description: Bitwise mask set if the central pixel from all images satisfy each condition in z (see the DR8 bitmasks page)

wisemask_w1.name: WISEMASK_W1
wisemask_w1.description: W1 bitmask as cataloged on the DR8 bitmasks page

wisemask_w2.name: WISEMASK_W2
wisemask_w2.description: W2 bitmask as cataloged on the DR8 bitmasks page

psfsize_g.name: PSFSIZE_G
psfsize_g.description: Weighted average PSF FWHM in the g band

psfsize_r.name: PSFSIZE_R
psfsize_r.description: Weighted average PSF FWHM in the r band

psfsize_z.name: PSFSIZE_Z
psfsize_z.description: Weighted average PSF FWHM in the z band

psfdepth_g.name: PSFDEPTH_G
psfdepth_g.description: For a 5σ point source detection limit in g, 5/sqrt(PSFDEPTH_G) gives flux in nanomaggies and -2.5(log10(5/sqrt(PSFDEPTH_G))-9) give corresponding magnitude

psfdepth_r.name: PSFDEPTH_R
psfdepth_r.description: For a 5σ point source detection limit in g, 5/sqrt(PSFDEPTH_R) gives flux in nanomaggies and -2.5(log10(5/sqrt(PSFDEPTH_R))-9) give corresponding magnitude

psfdepth_z.name: PSFDEPTH_Z
psfdepth_z.description: For a 5σ point source detection limit in g, 5/sqrt(PSFDEPTH_Z) gives flux in nanomaggies and -2.5(log10(5/sqrt(PSFDEPTH_Z))-9) give corresponding magnitude

galdepth_g.name: GALDEPTH_G
galdepth_g.description: As for PSFDEPTH_G but for a galaxy (0.45" exp, round) detection sensitivity

galdepth_r.name: GALDEPTH_R
galdepth_r.description: As for PSFDEPTH_R but for a galaxy (0.45" exp, round) detection sensitivity

galdepth_z.name: GALDEPTH_Z
galdepth_z.description: As for PSFDEPTH_Z but for a galaxy (0.45" exp, round) detection sensitivity

psfdepth_w1.name: PSFDEPTH_W1
psfdepth_w1.description: As for PSFDEPTH_G (and also on the AB system) but for WISE W1

psfdepth_w2.name: PSFDEPTH_W2
psfdepth_w2.description: As for PSFDEPTH_G (and also on the AB system) but for WISE W2

wise_coadd_id.name: WISE_COADD_ID
wise_coadd_id.description: unWISE coadd file name for the center of each object

fracdev.name: FRACDEV
fracdev.description: Fraction of model in deVauc (in range 0..1)

fiberflux_g.name: FIBERFLUX_G
fiberflux_g.description: Predicted g-band flux within a fiber of diameter 1.5 arcsec from this object in 1 arcsec Gaussian seeing

fiberflux_r.name: FIBERFLUX_R
fiberflux_r.description: Predicted r-band flux within a fiber of diameter 1.5 arcsec from this object in 1 arcsec Gaussian seeing

fiberflux_z.name: FIBERFLUX_Z
fiberflux_z.description: Predicted z-band flux within a fiber of diameter 1.5 arcsec from this object in 1 arcsec Gaussian seeing

fibertotflux_g.name: FIBERTOTFLUX_G
fibertotflux_g.description: Predicted g-band flux within a fiber of diameter 1.5 arcsec from all sources at this location in 1 arcsec Gaussian seeing

fibertotflux_r.name: FIBERTOTFLUX_R
fibertotflux_r.description: Predicted r-band flux within a fiber of diameter 1.5 arcsec from all sources at this location in 1 arcsec Gaussian seeing

fibertotflux_z.name: FIBERTOTFLUX_Z
fibertotflux_z.description: Predicted z-band flux within a fiber of diameter 1.5 arcsec from all sources at this location in 1 arcsec Gaussian seeing

ref_cat.name: REF_CAT
ref_cat.description: Reference catalog source for this star: "T2" for Tycho-2, "G2" for Gaia DR2, "L2" for the SGA, empty otherwise

ref_id.name: REF_ID
ref_id.description: Reference catalog identifier for this star; Tyc1*1,000,000+Tyc2*10+Tyc3 for Tycho2; "sourceid" for Gaia-DR2 and SGA

ref_epoch.name: REF_EPOCH
ref_epoch.description: Reference catalog reference epoch (eg, 2015.5 for Gaia DR2)

gaia_duplicated_source.name: GAIA_DUPLICATED_SOURCE
gaia_duplicated_source.description: Gaia duplicated source flag (1/0 for True/False)

gaia_astrometric_sigma5d_max.name: GAIA_ASTROMETRIC_SIGMA5D_MAX
gaia_astrometric_sigma5d_max.description: Gaia longest semi-major axis of the 5-d error ellipsoid

gaia_astrometric_params_solved.name: GAIA_ASTROMETRIC_PARAMS_SOLVED
gaia_astrometric_params_solved.description: Which astrometric parameters were estimated for a Gaia source

pmra.name: PMRA
pmra.description: Reference catalog proper motion in the RA direction

pmdec.name: PMDEC
pmdec.description: Reference catalog proper motion in the Dec direction

maskbits.name: MASKBITS
maskbits.description: Bitwise mask indicating that an object touches a pixel in the coadd/*/*/*maskbits* maps (see the DR8 bitmasks page)

ls_id.name: LS_ID
ls_id.description: Added by SDSS-V: Derived unique object identifier. Computed as follows: ls_id = objid + (brickid << 16) + (release << 40)

tycho_ref.name: TYCHO_REF
tycho_ref.description: Added by SDSS-V: TychoII identifier (equal to ref_id when ref_cat = "T2")

gaia_sourceid.name: GAIA_SOURCEID
gaia_sourceid.description: Added by SDSS-V: Gaia DR2 source_id identifier (equal to ref_id when ref_cat = "G2")
